description: A Flutter app's main entry point, setting up the MaterialApp, theme, and homepage widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState that constructs UI.
